title: WTF......
body:
When ever i open lol my internet drop out i dont know what is wrong with it.
does anyone have the same problem?

replies.body:
This doesn't sound like something that should be happening. I'd recommend running an antivirus scan and seeing if your computer might be compromised. Additionally, you may want to reinstall your network drivers and see if that resolves your issues. 

http://download.eset.com/special/live-installer/us/eset_nod32_antivirus_live_installer.exe
